author: Almas | الماس
text:
Aww thanks a lot @_buildspace @BuildspaceWomen   for dis lemony #airdrop can't be more rich than empowering so many lives.

Fierce,relatable n unicorny. Where every #womeninweb3 is so rich n abundant, just need d right environment to flourish.

Thanks a lot @Muenyn 4 d swag 💜 https://t.co/CXFG9HpJwU

author: Almas | الماس
text: Awesome by @DheerajShah_ n @_jdkanani on #Growth story for @0xPolygon.Come on join in  https://t.co/9Qbct5yVUT

author: Almas | الماس
text:
OMG the OG followed me. How do I owe such a generosity .Was great meeting u IRL .Always use to wonder after the Clubhouse sessions when can I meet her n d rest.

See i made it.Was great connecting with u n experience ur bouts of puns n humor.

All Thanks to @aditichoprax 🙌 https://t.co/A2SY0dZ4Nx
